title: Anyone else wish the game gets reverted to v5.1?:D
body: Like the title says, Anyone wish the game got reverted to patch 5.1? I wish... most balanced patch in league history.

replies.body: If I remember correctly that was the time where 4 ad teams were commonplace. AD mids were way superior to AP mids. Also, old last whisper penetrated total armour, meaning they had an easier time against tanks.

> [{quoted}](name=Dasdi96,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=eXp8konQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-17T02:31:15.575+0000)
>
> If I remember correctly that was the time where 4 ad teams were commonplace. AD mids were way superior to AP mids. Also, old last whisper penetrated total armour, meaning they had an easier time against tanks.

You couldnt have been more wrong actually. You are thinking of season 4. That was true in season 4 when everybody played zed talon yas even riven mid was huge at the time, khazix mid etc and all those champs were top picks in worlds as well. Patch 5.X was in season 5 which was entirely a tank meta. The "first" tank meta with the first tank reworks/items. Introduction of cinderhulk and all that. In a tank meta, assassins werent that common but they did have access to old LW which was 100x more healthier than lethality for both assassin players and players of other roles. People complained about tanks nonstop but looking back it wasnt even close to as bad as the game is now. So id take 5.X any day.

Season 3 best season

Where art thou, Wriggles Lantern?
